songs.title: Whatever You Like (EP)
songs.lyrics:
Ay Jim you know them old suga daddy's they be trickin they tell them girl's*
(I said you could have whatever youu like) [3x (fade)]
Yeahh

[Chorus:]
Stacks on deck
Patron on ice
And we could pop bottles all night
Baby you could have whatever you like (you like)
I said youu could have whatever youu like (you like)
Yeahh
Late night sex
So wet it's so tight
I'd gas up the jet for youu tonight
And baby youu could go wherever you (you like)
I said youu could go wherever you like (you like)
Yeahh

[Verse 1:]
Anytime you want to
Pick up the telephone you
Know it ain't nothinn to drop a couple stacks on youu
Want it youu could get it my dear
5 million dollar homes drop bentley's I swear
Yeahh

[Hook:]
I want'cho body
Need yo body
As long as youu got me you won't need nobody
You want it I got it
Go get it I buy it
Tell them othaa broke niggas be quiet

[Chorus]

[Verse 2:]
Shawty you the hottest
Love the way you drop it
Brain so good (good)
Coulda sworn you went to college
Hundred cake deposits
And vacations in the tropics
Errbody know it ain't trickin if youu got it
And you ain't neve eva gotta go in yo wallet
As long as I got rubbaband banks in my pockets
Five six
Rides with rims and noody kits
And you ain't gotta down grade
You can get what I get
My chick can have wha she wants
And go in any store
Buy any bag she want
I know you ain't never had a man like that
To buy you anythin your heart desire like that

[Hook]

[Chorus]

[Verse 3:]
I'm talkin big boy rides
And big boy ice
Let me put this big boy in yo life
The thang get so wet
And hit so right
Let me put this big boy in yo life
That's right

[Hook]

[Chorus]
